metadata.title: CVE-2017-13755 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In The Sleuth Kit (TSK) 4.4.2, opening a crafted ISO 9660 image triggers an out-of-bounds read in iso9660_proc_dir() in tsk/fs/iso9660_dent.c in libtskfs.a, as demonstrated by fls. It was discovered that The Sleuth Kit mishandled certain crafted ISO 9660 images. If an analyst were tricked into opening a malicious image, an attacker could cause a denial of service (crash).

criterions.comment: sleuthkit package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4.4.2-3').
